scripts.demonstrate:start: concurrently "npm run start --workspace development" "npm run start --workspace demonstrament"
scripts.demonstrate:restart: concurrently "npm run restart --workspace development" "npm run restart --workspace demonstrament"
scripts.demonstrate:stop: concurrently "npm run stop --workspace development" "npm run stop --workspace demonstrament"
scripts.demonstrate:delete: concurrently "npm run delete --workspace development" "npm run delete --workspace demonstrament"
